snippet: Thanks to the rapid industrialization of the fashion world, the city’s old-world handcraft ateliers were facing extinction. Then Chanel stepped in to save the day.
abstract: Thanks to the rapid industrialization of the fashion world, the city’s old-world handcraft ateliers were facing extinction. Then Chanel stepped in to save the day.

headline.main: Chanel, Self-Appointed Guardian of Paris's Artisan Workshops
